text: Siruvallur (), is a small neighbourhood of Perambur and a developed residential area in North Chennai, a metropolitan city in Tamil Nadu, India. ==Location== Siruvallur is located near Agaram, Peravallur, Venus and Perambur. It is well connected by train and bus transport. It is very close to Perambur Carriage Works Railway Station. ==References== Category:Neighbourhoods in Chennai
title: Siruvallur
